content:
[[=]]
+ This page doesn't exist yet!
[[/=]]

----

[[div style="background-color: #600; border: solid 1px #600; border-radius: 20px; color: #fff; width: 450px; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 150%; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5), inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.5), inset 0 10px rgba(255,204,204,.5), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,204,204,.3), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(48,0,0,.5); line-height: 100%; padding: 0 10px;"]]
**Did you get feedback first?**
[[/div]]

[[div style="background-color: #fff0f0; border: solid 1px #600; border-radius: 20px; color: #300; width: 450px; margin: 20px auto 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5); padding: 0 10px;"]]
The SCP Wiki has many resources to help you get feedback, and articles that have been critiqued are far more likely to be successful.
----
**[[[How to Write an SCP]]] -- [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sandbox SCP Sandbox Wiki] -- [[[Guide Hub]]]**

**[[[Image Use Policy]]]**

**[/forum/c-89000 Help Forum: Ideas Critique]**
**[/forum/c-50864 Help Forum: Drafts Critique]**
**[[[chat-guide|Chat Guide]]]**
[[/div]]

[[div style="background-color: #fffff0; border: solid 1px #660; border-radius: 20px; color: #330; width: 450px; margin: 20px auto 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5); padding: 0 10px;"]]
[[size 120%]]Remember: **The main site is for summary judgment of final work, not feedback and critique on unfinished work.**[[/size]]
----
It is your responsibility to post only finished, final work. Site members are not required to justify or explain their votes.

If you understand all of the above and still wish to create this page, **[[[/scp-6688/offset/1|click here]]]** to do so.
[[/div]]
author: Impperatrix
